about_the_game:
Turn The Perfect Tower II into Your Perfect Tower II!

This DLC unlocks the modding section of the game and provides you a pack of modding tools designed to customize your experience. Extend the game by adding your own modules, regions, buildings and more. Easily replace existing assets like textures, music and models inside the game. Play around with balancing and customizing the various progression systems the game offers. There are many systems currently in the game that can be utilized to create unique new mechanics without having to write a single line of code.*
Once you are done crafting your mod make sure to share your creation with the world.

You are also free to simply play mods created by the community. The underlying game architecture is designed to focus on modularity making it relatively easy to combine multiple mods into a pack.

Let your imagination run wild!

*Basic content mods can be created inside the modding tools without requiring any knowledge about coding. Complex logic inside your mod might involve lua scripting.
